title: Andrew Collins (Jalopnik)
description:
Andrew Collins is the Reviews Editor for Jalopnik.com and the owner of several fine, sort of terrible, great cars. We talk about his beloved, awesome-looking Scout, his 300ZX, and his newly-for-sale and sublime Acura TL. We also talk about the RAM TRX, the Raptor, jet skis, and a lot more. 

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @andrewpcollins

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @angrewatlarge

 

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/enoT0bp9F04
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
